title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.2 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.2 - Eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Eligible
municipality. An eligible municipality shall be a county, city, town or village
as defined in section 3(13) of the Facilities Development Corporation

Act. (b) Eligible project. An
eligible project shall be a project for which a municipality has determined the
need for assistance in connection with the design and/or construction of a
municipal health facility, municipal building or local correctional facility, pursuant to and defined in section 8-b, 14-a or 14-b of the Facilities

Development Corporation Act. (See McKinney's Unconsolidated Laws, section 4401
et seq.)

Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 21

2002.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
